localize.full_text: 不知道汤姆-布雷迪有一天退役后会不会推销比特币IRA呢https://t.co/I2mtNk7QAY。

previous.excerpt: The very first all-in-one Clubhouse management platform: The MVP version of Direcon is designed to solve the urgent problems of people who moderate rooms on Clubhouse like lack of insights about their rooms and limited moderation options.
previous.title: Direcon for Clubhouse - All-in-one Clubhouse management platform

localize.description: 第一款一体化的Clubhouse管理平台。MVP版的Direcon是为了解决在Clubhouse上管理房间的人的迫切问题 比如缺乏对房间的了解和有限的管理选择。
第一款一體化的Clubhouse管理平臺。MVP版的Direcon是爲了解決在Clubhouse上管理房間的人的迫切問題 比如缺乏對房間的瞭解和有限的管理選擇。
